Verses: 1 persiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Kores Arasaanda Moondraam Varushaththile Peldheshaadhsaar Endru Peyaridappatta Dhaaniyelukku Oru Kaariyam Veliyaakkappattadhu; Andhak Kaariyam Saththiyamum Neediya Yuththaththukku Aduththadhumaayirukkiradhu; Andhak Kaariyaththai Avan Gavaniththu, Dharisanaththin Porulai Arindhukondaan.
2 andha Naatkalil Dhaaniyelaagiya Naan Moondru Vaaramuzhuvadhum Dhukkiththukkondirundhen.

3 andha Moondru Vaarangalaagiya Naatkal Niraiverumattum Rusigaramaana Appaththai Naan Pusikkavumillai, Iraichchiyum Dhraatcharasamum En Vaaikkul Pogavumillai. Naan Parimalathailam Poosikkollavumillai.
4 mudhalaam Maadham Irubaththu Naalaanthedhiyile Naan Idhekkel Ennum Periya Aatrangaraiyil Irundhu,
5 en Kangalai Eredukkaiyil, Sanal Vasthiranthariththu, Thamadhu Araiyil Ooppaasin Thangakkachchaiyaik Kattikkondirukkira Oru Purushanaik Kanden.

6 avarudaiya Sareeram Padigappachchaiyaippolavum, Avarudaiya Mugam Minnanalin Pragaasaththaippolavum, Avarudaiya Kangal Erigira Theebangalaippolavum, Avarudaiya Buyangalum Avarudaiya Kaalgalum Thulakkappatta Vengala Niraththaippolavum, Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalin Saththam Janakkoottaththin Aaravaaraththaippolavum Irundhadhu.
7 dhaaniyelaagiya Naan Maaththiram Andha Dharisanaththaik Kanden; Ennode Irundha Manusharo Andhathdharisanaththaik Kaanavillai; Avargal Migavum Nadunadungi, Odi Oliththukkondaargal.
8 naan Thaniththuvidappattu Andhap Periya Dharisanaththaik Kanden; En Belanellaam Poyitru; En Uruvam Maari Vaadippoyitru; Thidanatrupponen.

9 avarudaiya Vaarththaigalin Saththaththaik Ketten; Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalin Saththaththai Naan Ketkumpodhu, Naan Mugankavizhndhu, Niththirai Pogiravanaaith Tharaiyile Mugankuppura Vizhundhukidandhen.
10 idho, Oruvan Kai Ennaiththottu, En Muzhangaalgalum En Ullankaigalum Tharaiyai Oondriyirukka Ennaith Thookkivaiththadhu.

11 avan Ennai Nokki: Piriyamaana Purushanaagiya Dhaaniyele, Naan Ippodhu Unnidaththirku Anuppappattu Vandhen; Aadhalaal, Naan Unakku Sollum Vaarththaigalinperil Nee Gavanamaayirundhu, Kaal Oondri Nil Endraan; Indha Vaarththaiyai Avan Ennidaththil Sollugaiyil Nadukkaththode Ezhundhu Nindren.

12 appozhudhu Avan Ennai Nokki: Dhaaniyele, Bayappadaadhe; Nee Arivai Adaigiradharkum, Unnai Unnudaiya Dhevanukku Munbaaga Sirumaippaduththugiradharkum, Un Manadhai Seluththina Mudhalnaal Thuvakki Un Vaarththaigal Ketkappattadhu; Un Vaarththaigalinimiththam Naan Vandhen.

13 persiyaa Raajyaththin Adhipadhi Irubaththoru Naalmattum Ennode Edhirththu Nindraan; Aanaalum Pradhaana Adhipadhigalil Oruvanaagiya Migaavel Enakku Udhaviyaaga Vandhaan; Aadhalaal Naan Ange Persiyaavin Raajaakkalidaththil Thariththirundhen.
14 ippodhum Kadaisinaatkalil Un Janangalukku Sambavippadhai Unakkuth Theriyappannumpadikku Vandhen; Indha Dharisanam Niraivera Innum Naal Sellum Endraan.
15 avan Indha Vaarththaigalai Ennode Sollugaiyil, Naan Thalaikavizhndhu, Tharaiyai Nokki, Pechchatrupponen.

16 appozhudhu Manupuththirarin Saayalaagiya Oruvan En Udhadugalaiththottaan; Udane Naan En Vaayaith Thirandhu Pesi, Enakku Edhire Nindravanai Nokki: En Aandavane, Dharisanaththinaal En Moottugal Purandana, Belanatrupponen.
17 aagaiyaal En Aandavanudaiya Adiyen En Aandavanode Pesakkooduvadheppadi? Ini Ennil Belanillai, Ennil Moochchumillai Endren.
18 appozhudhu Manusha Roobamaana Oruvan Thirumba Ennaith Thottu, Ennaith Thidappaduththi,

19 piriyamaana Purushane, Bayappadaadhe, Unakku Samaadhaanamundaavadhaaga, Thidankol, Thidankol Endraan; Ippadi Avan Ennode Pesugaiyil Naan Thidankondu Avanai Nokki: En Aandavan Pesuvaaraaga; Ennaith Thidappaduththineere Endren.

20 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Unnidaththirku Vandha Kaaranam Innadhendru Unakkuth Theriyumaa? Ippodhu Naan Persiyaavin Prabuvode Yuththampannath Thirumbippogiren; Naan Ponapinbu, Grekku Dhesaththin Adhipadhi Varuvaan.
21 saththiya Ezhuththile Kandirukkiradhai Naan Unakkuth Therivippen; Ungal Adhipadhiyaagiya Migaavelaiththavira Ennodekooda Avargalukku Virodhamaai Balankolgira Veroruvarum Illai.
